## SplitRecipient.splitPercentage property

The split of the recipient as a percentage of the total amount

I.e. If a recipient has a split of 50%, and the asset sells for 100 ETH, the recipient will receive 50 ETH.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
splitPercentage: number;
```
